fulltext:
NHƯ PHAN 
SOFTWARE DEVELOPER 
SUMMARY 
Innovative IT developer offers deep experiences to make softwares with highly effective and creative 
solutions to resolve technology challenges. 
CORE COMPETENCIES 
iOS - Objective-C 
iOS - Swift 
Team work - Scrum 
Agile development 
Familiar with JIRA, Trello, 
Pivotal.         
• 
Source code 
versioning: Bitbucket, Git 
• 
English communication 
• 
Working independent 
• 
Working in high pressure 
• 
Working with the server 
side. 
• 
Pair programming 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
EDUCATION 
2007 - 2010 
Le Khiet High school 
Special Informatics class 
2010 - 2014 
University of Science, Ho Chi Minh city 
Honor program  
DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE 
2018 - now 
Neptune PPA (East Agile) 
iOS Developer 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/neptuneppa/id1360631281 ?mt=8 
I own this project. It's written in swift, using MVVM architecture. 
The special thing is the UI made by coding totally without Storyboard.  
Building up this project from scratch. 
Training juniors. 
Unit test and integration test using KIF and MockingJay. 
2017 - 2018 
BBM (East Agile) 
• 
• 
• 
iOS developer 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/bbm/id690046600?mt=8 
This is the biggest application I worked in so far. There are many pillars in this project. Two pillars I 
worked in: 
- Asset Sharing: relating Chat, messages type, asset management, The biggest feature I owned is 
Storage management that allows user managing their assets, messages.  
- Virtual goods: relating Stickers store and the third-party BBMoji application (custom sticker maker). 
In this pillar, My main work is to maintain and add new features. 
• 
Learning and working with Agile Development Process and Pair Programming as well. 
• 
Writing Unit tests and Integration test. 
• 
Mocking data, make the code testable.  
2016 - 2017 
Headlne, Kid-villages, Araliya - Dating App 
iOS developer 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/headlne-best-news-app/id1072545214 ?mt=8 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/araliya-liyathabara-com/id1313580566 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/trump-headlne/id1121448732 ?mt=8 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/kidzville-kellyville/id1185352937 ?mt=8 
- Headlne project: My responsibility is maintaining, adding new features. 
- Kid-villages project: Building up from scratch and developing the new social application for day-care 
center.  
- Araliya project: Building up and developing the dating application. 
• 
Using Cloudinary, Photo library. 
• 
Using Socket to do chatting. 
• 
Encrypt/decrypt data. 
• 
Building up and structuring projects from scratch by myself. 
2016 - 2017 
SCUTIFY 
iOS Developer 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/scutify-passionate-investors-traders/id673974489?mt=8 
Worked on this project that gives me a chance to know more about iOS development by studying 
and applying storyboard to iOS project rather than using 100% code in previous projects. 
• 
Working with trading SDK. 
• 
Coding using storyboard. 
2014 - 2016 
Misfit Wearables (Fossil Viet Nam) 
iOS Developer 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/misfit-link/id1010611810 ?mt=8 
This is an international company that produces smart devices connecting with the phone via 
Bluetooth. Main work is making a new application, adding new features and maintaining. 
Studied deeply in Objective-C language. 
Be trained by professional seniors. 
Studied Objective-C. 
Studied Swift language. 
Developed and maintained Misfit LINK - One of three main Misfit's applications. 
Developed some internal applications for testing devices, demonstrations. 
Training-trip in the USA and taking part in two biggest technology events (WWDC 2016 and GOOGLE 
I/O 2016). 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
2013 - 2014 
LARION COMPUTER 
Web Developer 
This is my first company which provided opportunities to study new technology: Ruby/Rails. 
• 
Frontend: CSS, Javascript, HAML. 
• 
Studied about testing and quality of software. 
• 
Studied and worked with new language Ruby.
